T02D1745:113b-0: @113b * // rjes chags kyi sbyor bas de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag bzhugs /
T02D1745:113b-2: # // dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1745:113b-3: 'khrul pa mya ngan thang chen la //
T02D1745:113b-4: nyon mongs nyi mas rab gdungs pa'i //
T02D1745:113b-6: srog 'dzin mgon la nyer btud nas //
T02D1745:113b-7: gang gis nyon mongs zhi byed pa //
T02D1745:113b-8: rtogs dka' thabs mang rgya mtsho las //
T02D1745:113b-9: mchog gyur mgon pos gsungs pa'i don //
T02D1745:113b-10: bla ma'i gsung las blangs pa brjod //
T02D1745:113b-11: 'di na gang dag nyon mongs can //
T02D1745:113b-12: nyon mongs spong ba nyon mongs 'gyur //
T02D1745:113b-13: ji ltar bkres pas kha zas dang //
T02D1745:113b-14: skom pa chu la rgyab phyogs bzhin //
T02D1745:113b-15: dper na me yi bud shing dang //
T02D1745:113b-16: ma phrad sdud cing mi gsal zhing //
T02D1745:113b-19: yul la shin tu chags pa'i sems //
T02D1745:113b-20: 'dod pa spangs pas zlog byed pa //
T02D1745:113b-21: de ltar mi gyur thabs dman phyir //
T02D1745:113b-22: nyon mongs 'phel ba kho nar zad //
T02D1745:113b-23: gang dag shin tu bcings pa'i mi //
T02D1745:113b-25: bsam pa rtag tu sten byed cing //
T02D1745:113b-26: lus sems bde bar mi 'gyur bzhin //
T02D1745:113b-27: sems mi bde ba don gnyer bas //
T02D1745:113b-28: de rnyed par ni ma gyur par //
T02D1745:113b-29: kun tu rtog pa rgyas 'gyur zhing //
T02D1745:113b-30: gnyug ma'i yid gnas mi 'gyur ba //
T02D1745:113b-31: dper na glang chen ma rungs pa //
T02D1745:113b-32: gang tshe chang gis rab myos pa //
T02D1745:113b-33: phyi nas ngang gis dul 'gyur ba ;
T02D1745:113b-34: / de ltar sems kyi glang po yang //
T02D1745:113b-35: yul gyi chad gis rab myos na //
T02D1745:113b-36: dmu rgod rtog pa dul 'gyur zhing //
T02D1745:113b-37: gnyug ma rnal 'byor pa yis len //
T02D1745:113b-38: gang dag spros pas ma spros pa'i //
T02D1745:113b-39: gnyug ma'i sems yid ma rnyed na //
T02D1745:113b-40: rtog pa'i dra bas 'chad min te //
T02D1745:114a-2: de phyir yang dag gnyug ma'i yid //
T02D1745:114a-3: mthong bar 'dod pas lus dang sems //
T02D1745:114a-4: kun rtog rlung rnams zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1745:114a-5: nam yang gdung bar mi bya'o //
T02D1745:114a-6: de ltar gdur ba spangs pa las //
T02D1745:114a-7: sems ni bde ba'i ngo bor 'gyur //
T02D1745:114a-9: 'od gsal dri med nam mkha' mthong //
T02D1745:114a-11: yang dag bla ma'i man ngag gzhan //
T02D1745:114a-12: thabs dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1745:114a-13: rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten //
T02D1745:114a-14: gti mug 'khrul pa las kyi sbrus ;
T02D1745:114a-15: / sdug bsngal dpa' klong cher 'khrugs pa'i //
T02D1745:114a-16: 'khor ba'i chu bor bying ba yi //
T02D1745:114a-17: 'gro la brtse ba chen po bskyed //
T02D1745:114a-19: yang dag ye shes snang ldan pa'i //
T02D1745:114a-20: yi dam rgyal po'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1745:114a-21: sems can skyabs la brtson par bya //
T02D1745:114a-22: rang gi bskyed pa yi ge'i gzugs //
T02D1745:114a-23: de nyid snying gi dkyil du gzhag /'od kyis sdig pa zad byas te //
T02D1745:114a-24: 'gro mang sdug bsngal zhi bar bya //
T02D1745:114a-25: btus pa'i sbyor bas lha gang gi / gnas la dad bas de nyid bsam //
T02D1745:114a-26: byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur ba //
T02D1745:114a-27: gzhug dang mchod sogs thams cad bya //
T02D1745:114a-28: de nas bzhin ba zangs mig yangs ma //
T02D1745:114a-29: lang tsho rgyas shing skye gnas dang //
T02D1745:114a-30: nu ma mkhrang zheng sha rgyas pa'i //
T02D1745:114a-31: bu mo yid 'ong mdun du bzhag / gtsug tu mdzes dang ro ldan dang //
T02D1745:114a-32: bu ga 'phen dang bskyod pa dang //
T02D1745:114a-33: mtshams su mdzes par gyur pa yis //
T02D1745:114a-34: mdzes pa mdzes par bya ba dang //
T02D1745:114a-35: rnal 'byor la ni rtag gus shing //
T02D1745:114a-36: lhag par zab mo'i chos la dad //
T02D1745:114a-37: khro med rnam rtog spangs pa'i bdag / yongs su smin byas byin gyis brlab //
T02D1745:114a-38: gtso nyid gang gi rig ma ru //
T02D1745:114a-39: cho ga mkhas pas bsgoms nas kyang //
T02D1745:114a-40: de ru ye shes 'khor lo gzhug / mtshan ma gnyis kyang sngags kyis spyad //
T02D1745:114a-41: ling ga brtan por gyur pa ni //
T02D1745:114a-42: skye gnas dbus su gzhag par bya //
T02D1745:114a-43: dam por 'khyud pas gnas nas ni //
T02D1745:114a-44: yang dang yang du tsum pa bya //
T02D1745:114a-45: sen mos cung zad brud pa dang //
T02D1745:114b-0: ma mchu so yis btsir @114b bar bya //
T02D1745:114b-1: mig ni rab tu bsgyur bya zhing //
T02D1745:114b-2: lce yang lce yis bskyod par bya //
T02D1745:114b-3: mgrin par ros dgang ba dang //
T02D1745:114b-4: gshugs pa'am yang na gsal po ru //
T02D1745:114b-5: chags pa'i tshig gis sbyor ba yis //
T02D1745:114b-6: kha sbyor bde ba dang po bsgom //
T02D1745:114b-7: sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab ldan pa'i //
T02D1745:114b-8: rlung gi rang bzhin padma las //
T02D1745:114b-9: mgrin par 'bar ba'i ye shes ni //
T02D1745:114b-10: bya ba grub pa nyon mongs 'joms //
T02D1745:114b-11: de ru rdo rje nub gyur nas //
T02D1745:114b-12: rked pa bskyod pa spangs nas ni //
T02D1745:114b-13: lus ngag sbyor dang ldan pa yis //
T02D1745:114b-14: dgram zhing bsdu ba dag tu bya //
T02D1745:114b-15: mig ni sna rtser phab nas su //
T02D1745:114b-16: gzugs sogs yul la ma zhen par //
T02D1745:114b-17: de dag las skyes bde ba mchog / yang dag ye shes gnyis pa bsgom //
T02D1745:114b-18: brgyad gnyis 'dab mar bcas pa yi //
T02D1745:114b-19: chu yi ngo bo padma las //
T02D1745:114b-20: snying gar 'bab pa'i ye shes ni //
T02D1745:114b-21: so sor kun tu rtog par brjod //
T02D1745:114b-22: sgyu rtsal mkhas pas bskyod bya zhing ;
T02D1745:114b-23: / bu mos kyang ni rked pa bskor //
T02D1745:114b-24: dbugs kyang cung zad cung zad bsdam //
T02D1745:114b-25: dal gyis sgyu rtsal thams cad spyad //
T02D1745:114b-26: mig ni mi 'dzums par gyur pas //
T02D1745:114b-27: reg la rtog cing ma zhen par //
T02D1745:114b-28: bde ba'i ye shes gsum pa ni //
T02D1745:114b-29: rnal 'byor mkhas pas rtogs par bya //
T02D1745:114b-30: bcu drug phyed kyi 'dab mar bcas //
T02D1745:114b-31: chu yi rang bzhin padma las //
T02D1745:114b-32: lte bar 'bab pa'i ye shes ni //
T02D1745:114b-33: me long lta bur yang dag brjod //
T02D1745:114b-34: rigs kyi mtshan ma sa bon bcas //
T02D1745:114b-35: nor bur chud par bsam bya zhing //
T02D1745:114b-36: rlung dang yid ni mi rgyu bar //
T02D1745:114b-37: byas te mkhas pas 'dod pa gzung //
T02D1745:114b-38: gos med rtog pa nyer zhi ba //
T02D1745:114b-39: mig gnyis rab tu gdangs ba yis //
T02D1745:114b-40: rang byung gzhon med mkhas mnyam pa'i //
T02D1745:114b-41: ye shes bzhi pa gsal por bsgom //
T02D1745:114b-42: drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ldan pa'i //
T02D1745:114b-43: 'dab skyes sa yi rang bzhin las //
T02D1745:114b-44: de 'dab de ru zin gyur pa'i //
T02D1745:114b-45: ye shes mnyam pa nyid du brjod //
T02D1745:114b-46: gal te der ni ma zin na //
T02D1745:114b-47: bde ba chen po mi gsal zhing //
T02D1745:114b-48: phung po skye mched nyams pa dang //
T02D1745:114b-49: gnyis med ye shes rtogs mi 'gyur //
T02D1745:114b-50: dar ras las byas skud pa drug / sor bcu drug gis rked pa bsdams //
T02D1745:114b-51: bu mo'i khrag gis bsgos pa dang //
T02D1745:115a-2: sor bcu gnyis ldan shing bu la //
T02D1745:115a-3: mtha' ru sor gnyis dor ba dang /
T02D1745:115a-4: dkyil du srad bus bcings nas ni //
T02D1745:115a-5: sor drug rdo rje'i mdud pa byas //
T02D1745:115a-6: sor gnyis mtha' ru sbrel byas nas //
T02D1745:115a-7: mkhas pas rang gi rked par bcing //
T02D1745:115a-8: mdun gyi shing bus phra bkod de //
T02D1745:115a-9: lte ba'i phyogs gzhag par bya //
T02D1745:115a-10: bu mo'i byin pa g-yon pa ni //
T02D1745:115a-11: skyes bu'i drug khug g-yas pas blang //
T02D1745:115a-12: dbugs bsdams pa dang ldan pa yis //
T02D1745:115a-13: rtag tu thur sel brkyang bar bya //
T02D1745:115a-14: glang po'i sna yi sbyor ba ni //
T02D1745:115a-15: lag pa glang po'i sna lta bu //
T02D1745:115a-16: sna lnga sbyar bar byas pa yis //
T02D1745:115a-17: de ru sems 'gag the tshom med //
T02D1745:115a-18: sdu yi rtsa ba brdungs pa ni //
T02D1745:115a-19: lcags kyi snod du yun ring btsos //
T02D1745:115a-20: rtsig pa phud de ka ra dang //
T02D1745:115a-21: til dang sbyar ba mkhas pas bza' //
T02D1745:115a-22: 'di ni zos pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D1745:115a-23: stobs 'phel mdangs dang ldan pa dang //
T02D1745:115a-24: thig le 'dzin pa'i thabs kyi mchog / sman gyi sbyor ba dam pa'o //
T02D1745:115a-26: ka ra ha sa de bar sbyar //
T02D1745:115a-27: 'di ni bcud len mchog tu bshad //
T02D1745:115a-28: thig le 'dzin pa nyid yin no //
T02D1745:115a-29: bya yi brun dang mi khyi yi //
T02D1745:115a-30: rus pa bzhi bas pa'i lde gu yis //
T02D1745:115a-31: rdo rje rtag par bsku byed pa'i //
T02D1745:115a-33: khyim bya'i tshil bu til mar dang //
T02D1745:115a-34: byi'u yi sha rnams yang dag sbyar //
T02D1745:115a-35: de yis padma la bskus na //
T02D1745:115a-36: che ba'ang zum nas thig le 'dzin //
T02D1745:115a-37: lcum gyi rtsa ba brdungs pa yis //
T02D1745:115a-39: sa bon mi 'byung thabs kyi mchog / khyad par rdzas kyi sbyor ba'o //
T02D1745:115a-40: sna tshogs thabs la ma rmongs pas //
T02D1745:115a-41: nan tan byas te bzung ba de //
T02D1745:115a-42: myur du 'bad pas lus ngag dang //
T02D1745:115a-43: sems kyi rtsal gyis bzlog par bya //
T02D1745:115a-44: lus kyi rtsal gyis lte ba brdebs //
T02D1745:115a-45: de tshe ngag stobs yi ge h'um //
T02D1745:115a-46: lam yig phreng bar brgyud ma ni //
T02D1745:115a-47: drangs par bsams pa sems kyi stobs //
T02D1745:115a-48: mnyam gnas bskyod pa'i sbyor ba ni //
T02D1745:115a-49: dgu po lus stobs h'um yig gi / nga ro drag pos mgrin par dgang //
T02D1745:115a-50: mam yig phreng ba sems kyi rtsal //
T02D1745:115a-51: snying gnas lus stobs spug pa dang //
T02D1745:115b-0: pam yig phreng @115b bar bsams pa yin //
T02D1745:115b-1: gsung gi dbang phyug gnas su drang //
T02D1745:115b-2: lus kyi rtsal gyis mgrin par dgug / ngag gi aom yig 'dod la brtson //
T02D1745:115b-3: tam yig phreng bar bsam pa yis //
T02D1745:115b-4: phyag rgya chen po'i gnas su drang //
T02D1745:115b-5: sgo dgu dag pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1745:115b-6: rlung dang de bsres rtsa mig dgang //
T02D1745:115b-7: sdigs mdzub 'phen pa'i rtsal gyis kyang //
T02D1745:115b-8: yang dang yang du spro bar bya //
T02D1745:115b-9: de ltar sbyor ba de dag gis //
T02D1745:115b-10: spu yi khung bu'i gnas su yang //
T02D1745:115b-11: bde ba'i ye shes g-yos gyur te //
T02D1745:115b-12: kun rtog rdul dang bral bar 'gyur //
T02D1745:115b-13: de nas rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis //
T02D1745:115b-14: dh'u t'i dkar po stong pa ru //
T02D1745:115b-15: snying gi lam nas sems btsug pas //
T02D1745:115b-16: sna tshogs rtog pa nub par bsgom //
T02D1745:115b-17: dh'u t'i'i nang du rang gi sems //
T02D1745:115b-18: thig le'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ni //
T02D1745:115b-19: thur dub ba ste nor bu yi //
T02D1745:115b-20: nang du yang dag gnas par bsgom //
T02D1745:115b-21: thams cad stong pa bde ba chen //
T02D1745:115b-22: brjod med rang bzhin shes dka' zhing //
T02D1745:115b-23: rnam rtog dpa' rlabs nyer zhi ba //
T02D1745:115b-24: gsal ba'i ro ldan nyams su myong //
T02D1745:115b-25: ba spu gyen du log pa dang //
T02D1745:115b-26: lus ni drag tu 'bar ba dang //
T02D1745:115b-27: 'dar dang g-yo 'gyur mchi ma 'dzag / rdul bar 'gyur ba de dag rtags //
T02D1745:115b-28: yang na rtag par dgod pa dang //
T02D1745:115b-30: reg pa la sogs rkyen dag las //
T02D1745:115b-31: bde ba bzod dka' skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1745:115b-32: rtog med nyam nga rnam par spangs //
T02D1745:115b-33: dga' ba rgyas shing ngo tsha med //
T02D1745:115b-35: rang 'byung bde ba'i ros myos rtags //
T02D1745:115b-36: de ltar yang dag goms pa las //
T02D1745:115b-37: snang ba ye shes chen por 'char / phyag rgya ma la ltos med par //
T02D1745:115b-38: sgrib bral bde ba rgyas par 'gyur //
T02D1745:115b-39: bzang ngan bdag dang gzhan la sogs //
T02D1745:115b-40: yod dang med pa'i sbyor nyid dang //
T02D1745:115b-41: 'dir ni skyod dang yon tan sogs //
T02D1745:115b-42: bde ba che la mi mnyam med //
T02D1745:115b-43: bstod grags rnyed ldan bde gyur pa //
T02D1745:115b-44: 'dir ni smad cing ma grags dang //
T02D1745:115b-45: dbul po sdug phongs gang gyur pa //
T02D1745:115b-46: bye brag med pa rtog pa'i gdeng //
T02D1745:115b-47: mdor na gang tshe rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1745:115b-48: rtsol dang mi rtsol nyer zhi zhing //
T02D1745:115b-49: blang dor med par gang spyod pa //
T02D1745:116a-2: de ltar ma nyid bde ba che //
T02D1745:116a-3: mtha' bral rgyun mi 'chad pa yi //
T02D1745:116a-4: nyams su myong ba ma bstan par //
T02D1745:116a-5: sgyu 'phrul phyag rgya bzang mo bsten //
T02D1745:116a-6: mi mo mtshan nyid rab ldan zhing //
T02D1745:116a-7: rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba ni //
T02D1745:116a-8: rgyud las gsungs bzhin rnal 'byor pas ;
T02D1745:116a-9: / kha dog mtshan ma kun shes bya //
T02D1745:116a-10: 'gro tshogs chags sogs nyon mongs dang //
T02D1745:116a-11: sdug bsngal gdung ba bsil byed pa //
T02D1745:116a-12: rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud rnams las //
T02D1745:116a-13: rgyal bas gcig tu bka' stsal pa //
T02D1745:116a-14: dam pa'i man ngag la brten te //
T02D1745:116a-15: gsang chen theg pa'i lam gyi tshul //
T02D1745:116a-16: yang dag sbyar ba byas pa las //
T02D1745:116a-17: 'jig rten 'khor ba nub par shog / pandi ta
T02D1745:116a-18: chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad
T02D1745:116a-19: pa / rjes chags kyi sbyor bas de kho na'i
